Flow.description: Adding the Approval process to lock the Job record for Pending payment

formulas.description: {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}+0.000174 - this is 15 seconds {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}+0.00005787 - this is 5 seconds
formulas.name: Formula_NOW_Add_15_Seconds
Formula_ServResourceConfirmedGotChqCash
formulas.expression: {!var_ServiceResourceData.FirstName__c} & " " & {!var_ServiceResourceData.LastName__c} & " Confirmed they received a Chq or Cash."

formulas.name: Formula_ServResourceNOTConfirmedGotChqCash
formulas.expression: {!var_ServiceResourceData.FirstName__c} & " " & {!var_ServiceResourceData.LastName__c} & " confirmed they did NOT receive a Chq or Cash."

fields.name: DisplayTxtPend_Or_Reject_CustInvNotFound
fields.fieldText: We cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again or toggle 'Exit payment loop' to exit this process if not successful after a few attempts.

fields.name: ChkbxExit_payment_loop
fields.fieldText: Exit payment loop

fields.name: DisplayTxt30SecondsNotPassed
fields.fieldText:
15 seconds have not passed yet.

Please press Next when 15 seconds have passed.

Please wait until: {!var_NOW_Add_15_Seconds_Payment}

screens.name: Screen20_Seconds_not_passed_Cust_Invoice_Screen
screens.label: 20 Seconds not passed Cust Invoice Screen

fields.name: DisplayTxt_10_Seconds_not_passed_Cust_Invoice
fields.fieldText:
20 seconds have not passed yet.

Please press next when 20 seconds have passed.

Please wait until: {!var_NOW_Add_20_Seconds_CustInvoice}

screens.label: 20 Seconds not passed Cust Invoice Screen (Credit Cust)

fields.name: DisplayTxt_20_Seconds_not_passed_Cust_Invoice_CreditCust
fields.fieldText:
20 seconds have not passed yet.

Please press next when 20 seconds have passed.

Please wait until: {!var_NOW_Add_20_Seconds_CustInvoice}

screens.name: Screen20_Seconds_not_passed_Cust_Invoice_Screen_Pend_or_Reject
screens.label: 20 Seconds not passed Cust Invoice Screen (Pend or Reject)

fields.name: DisplayTxt_15_Seconds_not_passed_Cust_Invoice_PendReject
fields.fieldText:
20 seconds have not passed yet.

Please press next when 20 seconds have passed.

Please wait until: {!var_NOW_Add_20_Seconds_CustInvoice}

screens.name: Screen_so_that_eCommerce_URL_can_be_displayed_retrieved
screens.label: Screen so that eCommerce URL can be displayed/retrieved

fields.name: DisplayTxtClickNextforURL
fields.fieldText: Please click Next to display the URL to click on for the Customer to enter new card details.

fields.name: DisplayTxtAlternativeCreditCardSuccessful
fields.fieldText: Deposit payment has been successfully collected from the customer.

fields.name: DisplayTxtAlternativeCreditCardUNSuccessful
fields.fieldText:
The payment has failed.

Please press Next to select an alternative payment method.

fields.name: DisplayTxtCashCust_CustInvNotFound
fields.fieldText: We cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again or toggle 'Exit payment loop' to exit this process if not successful after a few attempts.

fields.name: ChkbxExit_payment_loop_CashCust
fields.fieldText: Exit payment loop

fields.name: DisplayTxtCreditCust_CustInvNotFound
fields.fieldText: We cannot find a customer invoice for this work order. Please press Next to search again or toggle 'Exit payment loop' to exit this process if not successful after a few attempts.

fields.name: ChkbxExit_payment_loop_CreditCust
fields.fieldText: Exit payment loop

screens.name: ScreenCredit_Customer_so_dont_need_Deposit
screens.label: Credit Customer so dont need Deposit

fields.name: DisplayTxtCreditCustomerDontNeedDeposit
fields.fieldText:
A new fixed price work order has been created.

This account type is {!var_AccountData.Account_Type__c}.

Payment is not required.

screens.name: ScreenCredit_Customer_so_dont_need_Deposit_Cust_Inv_Not_Found
screens.label: Credit Customer so dont need Deposit (Cust Inv Not Found)

fields.name: DisplayTxtCreditCustomerDontNeedDeposit_0
fields.fieldText:
This account type is {!var_AccountData.Account_Type__c}.

Payment is not required.


Deposit Invoice for On Site Agreement has not been found after several attempts.

Please contact the office and give them this screenshot.

Once screenshot taken please press Next to finish.

Notes: 'FL - FSL (mobile) Take Payment for Deposit On Site Agreement', Credit Customer branch - Deposit Customer Invoice was not found for On Site Agreement Work Order created from original Work Order: {!var_OriginalWorkOrderData.WorkOrderNumber}.

ONSA Work Order Work Type: {!var_WorkTypeData.Name}, after {!var_CounterPendRejectSearch_CI} attempts.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentStage
fields.fieldText:
The current payment stage is: {!var_PaymentData.asp04__Payment_Stage__c}

Payment number created is: {!var_PaymentData.Name}

Please press Next to see if payment stage changes to: Collected from customer

*If this doesnt happen after a few attempts please use the exit payment option below to exit the payment process. You must contact the office to confirm payment was successful.

fields.name: Exit_Payment_please_check_with_Office_payment_was_received
fields.fieldText: Exit Payment

fields.name: dispalytxtCINotFound
fields.fieldText:
Deposit Invoice for On Site Agreement has not been found after {!var_CounterPendRejectSearch_CI} attempts.

Office team has been notified.

fields.name: DisplayTxtFinish_CustWontPayOnDevice
fields.fieldText:
An email requesting payment has been sent to the customer.

Please press Next to end the payment process and check with the office that payment has been received once the customer has confirmed payment has been made.

screens.name: ScreenDeposit_Invoice_Still_Not_Found_after_Several_Attempts
screens.label: Deposit Invoice Still Not Found after Several Attempts

fields.name: DisplayTxtDeposit_Invoice_Still_Not_Found_after_Several_Attempts
fields.fieldText:
Deposit Invoice for On Site Agreement has not been found after {!var_CounterPendRejectSearch_CI} attempts.

Please contact the office and give them this screenshot.

Notes: 'FL - FSL (mobile) Take Payment for Deposit On Site Agreement', Pending or Rejected branch - Deposit Customer Invoice was not found for On Site Agreement Work Order created from original Work Order: {!var_OriginalWorkOrderData.WorkOrderNumber}.

ONSA Work Order Work Type: {!var_WorkTypeData.Name}.

fields.name: DisplayTxtFirst4DigitsVerification_FAILED
fields.fieldText:
Oops! The first 4 digits entered do not match the {!var_AuthorisationData.asp04__Card_Type__c} card ending XXXX-{!Formula_Auth_AccountRef_Last4Digits}.

Please press Next to either enter the first 4 digits again or choose another payment method.

fields.name: DisplayTxt_eCommerceURL
fields.fieldText:
Please click on the link below to add alternative credit card details:

{!var_PaymentData.asp04__eCommerce_URL__c}

And then return to the mobile app and click Next to confirm if payment was taken successfully or not.

fields.name: DisplayTxtFirst4DigitsVerification
fields.fieldText: For security please pass the phone to the customer to enter the first 4 digits of the {!var_AuthorisationData.asp04__Card_Type__c} card ending XXXX-{!Formula_Auth_AccountRef_Last4Digits}. Payment amount: £{!var_Deposit_Customer_Inv_Data.Charge_Gross__c}.

fields.name: Please_enter_the_first_4_digits_of_your_card_number
fields.fieldText: Please enter the first 4 digits of your card number:

screens.name: ScreenNew_FP_Work_Order_Created_Pend_or_Reject
screens.label: New FP Work Order Created (Pend or Reject)

fields.name: DisplayTxtNewWOCreated_Pend_Reject
fields.fieldText: A new fixed price work order has been created. We've sent an email to the customer with the estimate and the option to accept at a later stage.

fields.name: DisplayTxtNoAuthFound
fields.fieldText:
A valid Authorisation record (credit card) was not found.


Please press Next to choose an alternative payment method.

screens.name: ScreenNot_Failed_and_Not_Collected_from_Cust
screens.label: Not Failed and Not Collected from Cust

fields.name: DisplayTxtNot_Failed_and_Not_Collected_from_Cust
fields.fieldText:
The payment stage is currently {!var_PaymentData.asp04__Payment_Stage__c}.

Please press Next to search again.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentOptionNotMade
fields.fieldText: A payment option was not made - please press next to return to the previous screen.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentProcessExited
fields.fieldText: The payment process was exited. Please check with the office that the payment went through successfully after checking {!var_CheckPaymentStatusNumber} times.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentRecordCreated
fields.fieldText:
A Payment record is created for £{!var_Deposit_Customer_Inv_Data.Charge_Gross__c}. To complete the payment please press Next.

****Please now wait 15 seconds for the payment to be processed before clicking Next****

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentStage_Failed
fields.fieldText:
The payment process stage is {!var_PaymentData.asp04__Payment_Stage__c}.

Please press Next to select alternative payment method.

fields.name: DisplayTxtBACs_Selected
fields.fieldText:
As a BACs payment was selected please check with the office that payment was received.

Please press next to end the payment process.

fields.name: RadbtnsHave_you_received_the_cheque
fields.fieldText: Have you received the cheque?

fields.name: RadbtnsHave_you_received_the_cash
fields.fieldText: Have you received the cash?

fields.name: DisplayTxtFinish
fields.fieldText:
As a cheque payment was selected please ensure this is passed onto the office.

Please press next to end the payment process.

fields.name: DisplayTxtFinish_0
fields.fieldText:
As a cash payment was selected please ensure this is passed onto the office.

Please press next to end the payment process.

fields.name: DisplayTxtPaymentSuccessfullyTaken
fields.fieldText: Payment has been successfully collected from the customer.

screens.name: ScreenPlease_select_alternative_method_of_payment
screens.label: Please select alternative method of payment

fields.name: PicklsitPlease_select_alternative_payment_method
fields.fieldText: Please select alternative payment method

fields.name: DisplayTxtValidAuthFound
fields.fieldText:
We have a {!var_AuthorisationData.asp04__Card_Type__c} card on file ending XXXX-{!Formula_Auth_AccountRef_Last4Digits}.

Does the customer wish to process £{!var_Deposit_Customer_Inv_Data.Charge_Gross__c} on this card?

fields.name: PicklistPlease_choose_PayUsingAuthOrNot
fields.fieldText: Please choose

fields.name: DisplayTxtWait_for_Customer_Invoice_creation
fields.fieldText: Please wait 20 seconds

screens.name: ScreenWait_for_Customer_Invoice_creation_Credit_Cust
screens.label: Wait for Customer Invoice creation (Credit Cust)

fields.name: DisplayTxtWait_for_Customer_Invoice_creationCreditCust
fields.fieldText: Please wait 20 seconds

screens.name: ScreenWait_for_Customer_Invoice_creation_Pending_or_Rejected
screens.label: Wait for Customer Invoice creation (Pending or Rejected)

fields.name: DisplayTxtWait_for_Customer_Invoice_creationPendReject
fields.fieldText: Please wait 20 seconds

fields.name: DisplayTxtWill_Customer_pay_via_device
fields.fieldText: If the customer does not want to pay via your device please select this below and an email will be sent to them with a payment link.

fields.name: RadbtnPlease_confirmPayViaDevice
fields.fieldText: Please confirm:

fields.name: test2
fields.fieldText:
Please ignore the text below. Click Next to continue. 


Account

{!var_Deposit_Customer_Inv_Data.Account__c}

CI - ID

{!var_Deposit_Customer_Inv_Data.Id}

JOB ID

{!var_CreatedWorkOrderData.Job__c}

Retrieved JOB ID

{!var_retrievedworkOrdercreated.Job__c}

Time

{!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}

fields.name: Show_Id
fields.fieldText:
Object : {!var_CreatedWorkOrderData}

WO ID :{!var_CreatedWorkOrderData.Id}

Job ID :{!var_CreatedWorkOrderData.Job__c}

fields.name: DisplayTxtvar_AltCC_Counter_is_4
fields.fieldText:
As after 4 attempts the payment stage is still not Collected from customer and has not failed there may be a problem with our payment provider.

Please contact the office and give them a copy of this screenshot.

Notes for Office:

If the On Site Agreement payment has gone through successfully then the new Work Order will need to be updated:' Payment Status' to Paid

Customer Invoice: 'Status' to Paid

*If you dont think payment was successfully entered please amend the toggle below to select an alternative payment method, else this process will end when you click Next.

fields.name: ChkbxAlternative_payment_method
fields.fieldText: Alternative payment method

textTemplates.name: CInotfoundmailtext
textTemplates.text:
Hi Team,
Deposit Customer Invoice was not found for On Site Agreement Work Order created from original Work Order: {!var_OriginalWorkOrderData.WorkOrderNumber}. ONSA Work Order Work Type: {!var_WorkTypeData.Name}.
Thanks, Aspect.

variables.description: this variable is introduced to over CI not found error. To fetch the job if by anychance there is a sync timing issue
variables.name: var_retrievedworkOrdercreated
